title: Regularization
subtext: Prevents overfitting by adding penalties to model complexity.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Regularization
texts: Regularization is a technique used to prevent overfitting by adding a penalty to the complexity of the model. It helps in keeping the model simpler and more generalizable.
It's like adding rules to limit how much a model can change to avoid fitting too closely to the training data.
